page.title: 121085-1985 (M)ANY CHANGES ?
page.content:
{The same Ralph holds ALMELEIA (Elmley {Lovett) and Walter holds it of him... {In the time of King Edward it was {worth ten pounds. Its present value is {sixteen pounds. So{Domesday}: a valuable and an appreciating asset.
Beyond the disappearance of three mills and four saltworks the description then given would almost fit today.
For Time Has Passed This Quarter By. It is not an area to go to, but to cross when going Somewhere Else.
All are eager to be elsewhere, no heed given to the fourteen{villeins,}the fifteen{bordars}(or the eight ploughs) who have quietly occupied the land for over a thousand years.
